RemiliaMod:RXiangDui.NAME: Experienced Devil
RemiliaMod:RXiangDui.FLAVOR: As a young devil, you'll learn and improve during your journey
DESCRIPTIONS: Your relative number will determine your magic bonus and physical bonus.
Remilia gains the ability to learn from each battle.

RemiliaMod:RFkXt.NAME: Card system
RemiliaMod:RFkXt.FLAVOR: Remilia will convert lesser cards to better cards
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing three Bat Swarm (lesser magic), add a Small Gun to your hand.
After playing three Bat (intermediate magic), it will Exhaust, and a Lesser Night will be added to your hand.
Right click on the relic to get a card ready

RemiliaMod:RHW.NAME: Red Mist
RemiliaMod:RHW.FLAVOR: Enhance the Red Mist of Remilia.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enhance one Red Mist effect per turn, Give Remilia 1 Strength

RemiliaMod:RLLDDJ.NAME: Devil's bargain
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of the round, give yourself 1 Weak, 2 Strength, and give your ennemies 1 Strength.

RemiliaMod:RWYXT.NAME: Maid Service
RemiliaMod:RWYXT.FLAVOR: Your servant shall assist you in battle
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play 3 Maid's Knives in one round, heal 1 HP, and gain 2 Rune
Remove the magic cannon fragments at the beginning of each turn. When there are six, the succubus's magic cannon is permanently added to the hand.

RemiliaMod:RWYXD.NAME: Knife
DESCRIPTIONS: Enhance one infinite knife ability per turn
